means: （爱斯基摩人中的）阿留申人，阿留申语

sentence.Network_en: Ethnic Composition: White - 82.9 % ; Black - 12.7 % Asian and Pacific Islander - 3.3 %; American Indian, Eskimo, and Aleut - 0.8 %; other - 01 % . ( 2000 )
sentence.Network_cn: 民族: 白人占 82.9%; 黑人占12.7%;亚洲人后裔及太平洋岛民占3.3%; 美洲印第安人 、 爱斯基摩人和阿留申人占0.8%; 其它占0.1%.

list.abs: aleuteridae 革鲀科, aleuts 阿留申人, aleutite 闪辉安山岩

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the people inhabiting the Aleutian Islands and western Alaska
2. the language spoken by the Aleut people

auth_sentence.content: The closest community to the volcano is Nikolski, an Aleut village of about 20 people located 45 miles to the east.
